title: Chrissy's Court
overview: Real people. Real cases. And real, legally binding decisions. If you thought Chrissy Teigen couldn't become an actual courtroom judge, you've been overruled.In each episode of Chrissy's Court, Chrissy Teigen reigns supreme as the "judge" over one small claims case. Chrissy's mom turned "bailiff," Pepper Thai, maintains order in the courtroom.
